        description - The description of the item

      • checkUsernamePassword

        public abstract long checkUsernamePassword(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Check that a user's user name and password is correct
        Parameters:
        username - The username that the user has entered. Must return '-1' if username is equal to NULL.
        password - The password that the user has entered. Must return '-1' is password is equal to NULL.
        Returns:
        The userID of the user if the username and password are correct. Otherwise returns -1.

      • makeNewAuthToken

        public abstract java.lang.String makeNewAuthToken(long userID)
        Makes a new auth token for a user and updates the value in the database to the value of the new auth token
        Parameters:
        userID - The userID of the user to create a new auth token for. Must return NULL if the userID is less than 1
        Returns:
        The new auth token if the update to the auto token was successful, NULL otherwise.

      • checkAuthToken

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean checkAuthToken(long userID,
                               java.lang.String authToken)
        Checks if the auth token passed matches the auth token in the database for the given userID
        Parameters:
        userID - The user to be checked
        authToken - The auth token we expect the user to have
        Returns:
        TRUE if the auth token passed matches the auth token in the database, FALSE otherwise. Returns FALSE if userID<1 or auth token is NULL.

      • logout

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean logout(long userID)
        Logs a user out by setting the auth token in the database to NULL. As NULL is not an acceptable auth token to check against, no one can pretend to be the user without correctly logging back in and recreating the auth token with the correct username and password. To prevent other people logging a user out, the application code would want to check the user's userID/authToken match before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        userID - The user to be logged out
        Returns:
        TRUE if the user's authToken was set to NULL, false otherwise. Returns FALSE if the userID is less than 1.

      • insertAddress

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean insertAddress(long userID,
                              java.lang.String street,
                              java.lang.String town,
                              java.lang.String zip,
                              int state,
                              java.lang.Boolean isDefault)
        Inserts an address for the user in to the database
        Parameters:
        userID - The userID of the person who lives at the address
        street - The adress's street
        town - The adress's town
        zip - The address's zip
        state - The address's state
        isDefault - Whether the address is the users default address
        Returns:
        TRUE if the address was correctly inserted, FLASE otherwise. FALSE if userID or state < 1 or if other variables are NULL.

      • updateAddress

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean updateAddress(long id,
                              long userID,
                              java.lang.String street,
                              java.lang.String town,
                              java.lang.String zip,
                              int state,
                              java.lang.Boolean isDefault)
        Updates a user's address
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the address to be updated
        userID - The userID of the user who lives at the address
        street - The new street
        town - The new town
        zip - The new zip code
        state - The new state
        isDefault - Whether the address is the user default address
        Returns:
        TRUE if the address is correctly updated, FALSE otherwise. FALSE if the address id and userID do now match i.e. they are trying to update someone else's address. FALSE if id, userID or state < 1. FALSE is other values are NULL

      • insertItemDB

        protected abstract long insertItemDB(long userID,
                java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String description,
                double startPrice,
                double reservePrice,
                double buyNowPrice,
                int quantity,
                java.util.Date endDate,
                long categoryID)
        Inserts an item in to the items table, typically an item sell. set's the thumbnail to be "blank.jpg" by default
        Parameters:
        userID - The user inserting the item
        name - The name of the item
        description - The description of the item
        startPrice - The items start price
        reservePrice - The items reserve price
        buyNowPrice - The items buy now price
        quantity - The number of items to be sold
        endDate - The date the auction ends
        categoryID - The category that the item is to be sold in
        Returns:
        The itemID number of the item inserted. If the item was not inserted then -1 is returned. -1 of the item name, description, endDate are null, or the userID or categoryID is less than 1 or if any of the prices are less than zero, or if the quantity is less than one

      • insertBidDB

        protected abstract double insertBidDB(long userID,
                 long itemID,
                 int quantity,
                 double bid,
                 double maxBid)
        Inserts a user's bid for an item in to the database. It must also update the Item to inculde the new maxBid price that the user is willing to pay. We must ensure that there are no concurrency problems and that only one person is buy/bidding at a time on an item. Return -1.0 if user or item <1, or quantity<1 if bid<=0 or bid
        Parameters:
        userID - The user bidding
        itemID - The item they are bidding for
        quantity - The quantity of the item they want to buy
        bid - The current amount they are bidding
        maxBid - The maximum amount they will bid
        Returns:
        The current bid price if the bid was correctly inserted (the current item bid price, not just the user's bid). -1.0 if the bid was not inserted or userID or itemID < 1

      • insertBid

        public double insertBid(long userID,
               long itemID,
               int quantity,
               double bid,
               double maxBid)

      • buyItemNow

        public java.lang.Boolean buyItemNow(long userID,
                           long itemID,
                           int quantity,
                           Account account,
                           Address address)

      • buyItemNowDB

        protected abstract java.lang.Boolean buyItemNowDB(long userID,
                             long itemID,
                             int quantity,
                             Account account,
                             Address address)
        Buys an item for a user. Checks the quantity is sufficient, inserts their payment, inserts that they have purchased the item, updates the items quantity, moves the item and bids to the old tables if the quantity is now zero (i.e. the auction has finished)
        Parameters:
        userID - The user buying the item
        itemID - The item the user is buying
        quantity - The quantity the user would like to buy
        account - The accountID that the user is paying with. Can be a new account with an id of less than 0 (i.e. an account we do not have on record)
        address - The address that they user is billing to.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the purchase was successful. FALSE if userID or itemID < 1, or if account or address is NULL, or if purchase was unsuccessful or item is not for buy now (buy now price=0.0)

      • insertThumbnail

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean insertThumbnail(long itemID,
                                java.lang.String URL)
        Updates an item in the database with a new thumbnail image
        Parameters:
        itemID - The item to be updated
        URL - The url to the thumbnail
        Returns:
        TRUE if the thumbnail was successfully inserted. FALSE if itemID < 1, URL = NULL or not updated

      • insertImage

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean insertImage(long itemID,
                            int position,
                            java.lang.String URL,
                            java.lang.String description)
        Inserts a link in the database from an item to an image
        Parameters:
        itemID - The item that the image belongs to
        position - The position that the image should appear when displayed
        URL - The URL to the image
        description - The alt description of the image
        Returns:
        TRUE if the image was successfully inserted. FALSE if itemID < 1, position<0, URL or description = NULLor not updated

      • getCurrentBids

                                      long ts)

        Parameters:
        userID - The user ID to get the bids for
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the user's bids. An empty array if there are no bids or the userID < 1

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • insertUser

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean insertUser(java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String password,
                           java.lang.String email,
                           java.lang.String firstName,
                           java.lang.String lastName)
        Inserts a user into the database. Before calling this method you should check that the username and e-mail are not taken
        Parameters:
        username - The user's username
        password - The user's password
        email - The user's email address
        firstName - The user's first name
        lastName - The user's last name
        Returns:
        TRUE if the user was successfully inserted. FALSE if nay passed value is NULL, or the user is not inserted

      • insertComment

        public abstract long insertComment(long userID,
                 long sellerID,
                 long itemID,
                 int rating,
                 java.util.Date created,
                 java.lang.String comment)
        Inserts a feedback comment about an item/user
        Parameters:
        userID - The user who is inserting the comment
        sellerID - The user who the comment is about
        itemID - The item that the buying user is referring to
        rating - The rating the buying user is giving the selling user
        created - The date the feedback was created
        comment - The text of the comment
        Returns:
        The id of the newly inserted comment, -1 if not inserted
